- Location: Sliding balcony window screen; bottom track inner edge.
- Materials: Aluminum frame; metal mesh screen.
- Observations: Lower portion of screen mesh torn/missing at center-right.
- Observations: Screen appears not fully seated in bottom track; potential gaps and insect barrier compromise.
- Observations: Bottom track shows paint chipping and light corrosion/wear; may affect operation.
- Notes: No visible leaks or staining on interior surface in this image; screen repair/replacement recommended.
